title: Pereira da Silva (Father José)
body: He was born in Porto on March 19, 1874, joined the Lazarists congregation in 1890, and was ordained as a priest in 1898. In the same year, he came to Madeira, where he was a teacher and eventually vice-rector of the Seminary. He left for Hamburg and from there to Paris on October 21, 1910, passing away in the latter city on June 14, 1922. He authored: *To the memory of Leâo XIII*; funeral prayer delivered at the Cathedral on November 12, 1903; Funchal, 34 pages.

1874: Birth of Father José Pereira da Silva
